title: Blitz bug
body: I went and played a game in intro bots...I pulled the blue guy...the pull did not pull blue guy the full length to big bad blitzy...and I saw a riven building runaan's

replies.body: Couldn't have been in intro then, all the bots build in intro are Tier 1 boots and Doran's Blade/shield/ring
Ruunan's on Riven OP, her ult fires off 9 shots instead of 3. Try it in ranked, it's freelo.
Yeah, listen to this guy who is Troll V
